homeWelcome: Welcome to the Gen UI App showcase. Explore our components and features.
componentsShowcaseDesc: Explore interactive UI components with live demos and customization options.
chatDemoDesc: Interactive chat interface demonstration - Coming soon.

chat.welcome: Hello! How can I help you with your banking needs today?
chat.error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
chat.completed: Task completed successfully! Is there anything else I can help you with?
chat.title: Banking Assistant
chat.bankingWelcome: Welcome to your Banking Assistant! I can help you with expenses, loans, lost cards, and more. How can I assist you today?
chat.bankingPlaceholder: Ask about your expenses, request a loan, report a lost card...

expenseList.title: Expense breakdown
expenseList.subtitle: Transactions approved but not yet posted in Israel or abroad

aiChat.title: AI Chat Assistant
aiChat.welcome: Start a conversation by typing a message below
aiChat.apiKeyMissing: OpenAI API key not configured. Please set VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY or REACT_APP_OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable.

loanRequest.title: Quick Cash Loan
loanRequest.subtitle: What amount are you thinking of?
loanRequest.editable: We can tailor the best offer for you
loanRequest.disclaimer: Subject to approval and terms of Isracard Mikoum Ltd., failure to repay the loan or Israeli may result in penalty interest charges and enforcement proceedings

pin.title: Enter PIN Code
pin.subtitle: For security, please enter your PIN code

success.title: Loan Approved!
success.subtitle: The money will be transferred to your account within 24 hours

lostCredit.title: Report lost or stolen card
lostCredit.subtitle: Swipe and select the card you wish to report

reasons.payments: I see payments I didn't make

lostCredit.confirmSubtitle: We blocked your card and will issue a replacement soon. We'll keep you updated.

settings.title: Settings
settings.openaiConfigDesc: Manage your OpenAI API key settings
settings.apiKeyNote: Your API key is stored locally in your browser and never sent to our servers.
settings.aboutDesc: You can obtain an API key from OpenAI's platform. The key is used to authenticate requests to OpenAI's services and enable AI functionality in this demo.

openaiModal.title: OpenAI API Key Required
openaiModal.subtitle: Enable AI functionality
openaiModal.description: This demo requires an OpenAI API key to function. Your key will be stored securely in your browser's local storage and used only to communicate with OpenAI's services.
openaiModal.secureDesc: Your key is stored locally and never sent to our servers
